name: Moco[Beta]
description:
MOCO

Moco is an experience. Moco is but a simple little mucus surviving inside a body. Don't worry, there are many Moco to spare if you lose your Moco. Enjoy Moco. Moco is love. Moco is life.

Controls:
  • Left and Right Arrow keys/A and D Keys - Move
  • Spacebar/W/Up Key - Jump
  • Down Key/S Key - Crouch
This game was made using the Godot engine for GDKO2023 Round 1. Two free sounds were used from freesound.org.
Finger Noise: https://freesound.org/s/446105/
Fart Sound: https://freesound.org/s/253799/
